TEXT.TITLE: <TOROMONT INDUSTRIES LTD> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 49 cts vs 47 cts Oper net 1,475,000 vs 1,474,000 Revs 85.8 mln vs 90.6 mln Note: Current shr and net exclude extraordinary loss of 3,413,000 dlrs or 1.13 dlrs shares, versus extraordinary loss of 63,000 dlrs or two cts share in prior year Reuter
